snippet: An M.I.T. physicist's video series gets other researchers to open up about their lives and passions.
abstract: An M.I.T. physicist's video series gets other researchers to open up about their lives and passions.
lead_paragraph: "Cambridge Nights: Conversations About a Life in Science," is intended to allow scientists to open up about their lives, their work and their views of the world, reports John Markoff. Read more »

headline.main: Scientist's Online Interviews Draw His Peers Out of Lecture Mode
